critical_question_for_pipeline_coherence.question: How can we establish automated data consistency validation between agents to prevent the 14,300% variance seen between Agent 5 (95.74 units) and Agent 4 (13,682 units), ensuring all agents analyze the same comprehensive project scope?

evidence.agent_5_scope: Limited 7-day pipeline analysis focusing on specific commit patterns
evidence.impact_on_legitimacy: Pipeline credibility compromised without unified data foundation

critical_question_for_pipeline_coherence.proposed_solution: Implement cross-agent validation checkpoints requiring scope consistency verification before data handoff, with automated alerts for variance thresholds >10%
